org.vaadin.addons.sitekit.site

Interface Viewlet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFlowViewlet, AbstractViewlet, CompanyFlowViewlet, CompanyFooterViewlet, CompanyHeaderViewlet, CustomerFlowViewlet, GroupFlowViewlet, ImageViewlet, LoginFlowViewlet, NavigationViewlet, UserFlowViewlet

    public interface Viewlet
    Interface for viewlets. Viewlets are Portlet like components which are placed on SiteViews (pages).
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen
